data.title: Ahmanson Theatre
data.meta_description: The Ahmanson Theatre, located at The Music Center, is where we showcase the plays and musicals that everyone has been talking about or will be talking about. It’s where we produce and present pre-Broadway runs as well as the best of Broadway and the West End, turning a night at the theatre into a true event.
data.text:
The Ahmanson Theatre, located at The Music Center, is where we showcase the plays and musicals that everyone has been talking about or will be talking about. It’s where we produce and present pre-Broadway runs as well as the best of Broadway and the West End, turning a night at the theatre into a true event.

Tickets

Tickets start at $40.25 (all-in pricing including fees).

Tickets are available online, over the phone, or in person at our box office.

Audience Services

Tickets, Subscriptions, and General Information: 213.628.2772

Telephone Hours: Monday 10am-5pm; Tuesday through Saturday 12–8pm; Sunday 11am–7pm

Groups and Corporate Offers

Seating Chart

Ways to See Theatre

Gift Certificates

Venue Information

The Ahmanson Theatre is located in Downtown Los Angeles at The Music Center, at 135 N. Grand Ave., Los Angeles CA 90012.

Accessibility and Amenities

Our ACCESS program is committed to accessibility for all audiences. We offer a number of services to accommodate persons requiring mobility, vision, and hearing access.

One Saturday matinee for every mainstage Center Theatre Group production is designated as an ACCESS performance. These performances are designed for patrons who are deaf, hard of hearing, blind, and/or have low vision. ACCESS performances at the Ahmanson Theatre, Mark Taper Forum, and Kirk Douglas Theatre all offer American Sign Language interpretation and Audio Description.

Learn More

Connect with Us

Sign up for our enewsletter to receive curated news, show announcements, special offers, and insider insights straight to your inbox. Don't miss a beat in the world of live theatre—join us today!

Sign Up

Stay connected and be the first to know about the latest happenings at the Mark Taper Forum! Join our vibrant theatre community by following us on social media for behind-the-scenes glimpses, exclusive content, and real-time updates.

Have a following and want to help grow our audiences? Love live theatre, and unique, unforgettable experiences? Are you looking to create and spread amazing and thought-provoking social content? You could be a Center Theatre Group influencer!

Learn More

Support and Donations

As a nonprofit organization, Center Theatre Group relies on the generosity of our donors and members to produce and present the highest quality theatre on all three of our stages, to support artists in developing new work, and to educate and engage audiences throughout our community.

Make a tax-deductible donation to support Center Theatre Group today and unlock a myriad of benefits to enhance your theatregoing experience and bring yourself closer to the art and programs you love.
